game.title: The Lost Village
game.objective: Find the lost village and rescue its inhabitants.
game.description: The villagers have gone missing, and their homes are hidden in a nearby forest. You must find them and bring them back home safely.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces, 5 experience points, and a magical amulet
game.quest-giver: Gorin the Braveheart, the village elder

task.objective: Explore the forest and find any clues about the villagers' disappearance.
task.description: Talk to the forest creatures, examine the surroundings, and look for signs of struggle or escape routes.
task.location: The Old Oak Forest, near the entrance

task.objective: Follow the trail of breadcrumbs leading to the lost village.
task.description: Follow the path until you reach a clearing with a large stone marker. Investigate further from there.
task.location: The Clearing with the Stone Marker, near the center of the forest

task.objective: Rescue the villagers and escort them back to their homes.
task.description: You will find the villagers held captive by a group of bandits. Negotiate with them, use your skills to free the villagers, and lead them safely back home.
task.location: The Bandit Camp, near the eastern edge of the forest
